name: Wordz
tagline: Automation framework for generating unique content from any source and posting to hundreds of CMS's hands free!
body:
# wordz Automation framework for generating unique content from any source and posting to hundreds of CMS's hands free! ### Required Packages urllib2, re, sqlite3, wordai, wordpress_xmlrpc, json. ### Required API Keys [WordAI](https://wordai.com/api.php)
[Alchemy API](http://www.alchemyapi.com/api/register.html)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
